name: Meadows of Lost Friends
description:
A chill online multiplayer game about finding each other.

The players are in different, communicating worlds.
They want to find each other but cannot see or hear each other, only traces of their passage.

WASD/left stick to move, J to conjoin with other player.
Win by conjoining (J) at the same time, while in the conjunction area.
When pressing "Play", you get matched with a random online player.
To find the other player, follow their tracks. 

When the other player enters a conjunction area, you'll hear a chime. 

If both players press J while in the conjunction area, you find each other and the game is won.

Originally made during the Global Game Jam 2021 (https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/meadow-lost-friends-7)
